ygData.subject: Re: How to learn a language
ygData.msgSnippet: ... OH God do I know .. Somehow My character is bugged.. My Zone time s are Horror able, I mean Usually have time to go get a coffee, have A BR Break come  Sit
ygData.messageBody:
Tom Matthews wrote:

> From: Tom Matthews <tmatthews@...>
>
> And I have done it with four languages that way, about one complete cycle, you teach on one side, zone, I teach, zone back takes a little over 3 mins and we only go up 2 points, you throw in interuptions, etc. and the fact some people take 50 seconds
> to zone then you get 4 hours, we dont all have cable modems you know.
> Not everyone zones in 15 seconds, ok.
>

OH God do I know .. Somehow My character is bugged.. My Zone time's are Horror able, I mean Usually have time to go get a coffee, have A BR Break come Sit down , Roll a cig , and then i'm through, And to make the the best part .. I can't go back to
Erudin without going in shame, ( Bare assed Naked) No equipment , no spells on me , the only thing i have on me Are my lore items That's it .. Otherwise I crash , with All my Hot keys and Menus Reset , I manage to log in When the Boats Back in Erudin
Crossing , headed to Qeynos, I've reported this bug and heave tried in a while though ...


--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage
Erollisi Marr

-----------------------------------------------------------

"I've been a Wizard, Magician, Sorcerer, And Charlatan."

"Knowledge Is Power, Learn how to use It"

"Two are 10 times more powerful than One"
-----------------------------------------------------------
